verses.name: 2 Kings 18:34
verses.text: Where are the gods of Hamath, and of Arpad? where are the gods of Sepharvaim, Hena, and Ivah? have they delivered Samaria out of mine hand?

verses.name: 2 Kings 18:35
verses.text: Who are they among all the gods of the countries, that have delivered their country out of mine hand, that the Lord should deliver Jerusalem out of mine hand?

verses.name: 2 Kings 18:36
verses.text: But the people held their peace, and answered him not a word: for the king’s commandment was, saying, Answer him not.
